doctor.name: Dr. Md. Motiur Rahman
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Motiur Rahman is a Medicine Specialist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Medicine), DEM (BIRDEM). He is a Registrar, Department of Medicine at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Motiur Rahman at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi is 4:30pm to 9pm (Closed: Thu & Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. D. A. Rashid
doctor.info: Dr. D. A. Rashid is a Endocrinologist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, MCPS, MD (Endocrinology). He is a Former Associate Professor, Endocrinology at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Dr. D. A. Rashid at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi is 4pm to 10pm (Closed: Friday).
